info.name: Zimbra Dark Purple
info.description: Zimbra with a touch of my own personal stylings. Not the best looking but better than hot white light in your eye. Thanks to abolling for giving a jumping off point. Did some fix ups and added some color. Zimbra's css is a complete mess so there will be small issues. I've fixed as many as i could find and the code is enormous pile of clutter that likely has redundant parts in it. But as far as a i can tell it works.
info.additionalInfo:
V1.2 Fixed some issues with reading pane on right mode. Also fixed issue with selected row coloration that was driving me insane. 

V1.3
Added experimental html compatability. As long as it doesn't conflict with ajax it should remain in the code. Probably not going to make any edits to HTML from this point. I don't use it so i never see it. HTML code is well structured though.

Next update should rework the structure of the AJAX  mode code and work on making it more concise and commented. No promises. This things a mess and I'm not much of a maid.
